original: NORDENFELT, Åke Åkesson, överingenjör, Stockholm, f Höganäs 28/5 95 av disp Å H N 0 Lott Mannerskantz, gin (1) Gunhild Afzelius, (2) Lilly Rosell. Studex Sthlm 13, KTH (kemi) 15—19. Fänr i Vendes art.reg:s res 16, .ulöjtn 19, löjtn 25, kapt 41. Lab.ch o driftsing i Höganäs, pl.ch v Höganäs-Billesholms AB:s Trollhätteverk 20—30, inneh fma Halmstads Kem Tvätt- & Färgerianst 31—39, eg luftskyddstekn byrå, Industriluftskydd, i Sthlm 40—43, övering o deläg i Industriens Luftskyddsinstitut i Sthlm sed. 44 (vari fma Industriluftskydd uppgått). Resor: Tyskl, Frankr, Ital 20. Av trycket: Div artiklar mm 1 luftskyddsfrågor. Friv kapt i Finl 18 o 40. FFrK3o4kl, fyra finska tapperh- o minnesmedaljer, Hall o Nordv Skånes Lstfrbs ftjSM, Sv Lstfrn:s Centralfrbs ftjSM, Riksluftskydds-frbs ftjt s. Hobby: Segling.
translated: NORDENFELT, Åke Åkesson, Chief Engineer, Stockholm, b. Höganäs 28/5 1895, son of Lieutenant Åke Henrik Nils Gustaf Nordenfelt Mannerskantz and Gunhild Afzelius, married (1) Lilly Rosell. Studied in Stockholm until 1913, then at the Royal Institute of Technology (Chemistry) from 1915-1919. Became Second Lieutenant in the Vendes Artillery Regiment in 1916, First Lieutenant in 1919, Lieutenant in 1925, and Captain in 1941. Worked as a laboratory technician and operations engineer in Höganäs. Held a position as plant manager at Höganäs-Billesholms AB's Trollhätteverk from 1920-1930, owned Halmstads Chemical Laundry & Dyeing Company from 1931-1939, and was the owner of an air protection technical bureau, Industrial Air Protection, in Stockholm from 1940-1943. Served as Chief Engineer and co-owner at the Industrial Air Protection Institute in Stockholm since 1944 (which had previously incorporated Industrial Air Protection Company). Traveled to Germany, France, and Italy in 1920. Published several articles on air protection issues. Served as a volunteer Captain in Finland in 1918 and 1940. Awarded with FFrK3o4kl, four Finnish bravery and memorial medals, Halland and North Skåne Provincial State Fire Brigade silver medal, Swedish Provincial Fire Brigade Central Association silver medal, and National Air Protection Association gold medal. Hobby: Sailing.

parents.name: Åke Henrik Nils Gustaf Nordenfelt Mannerskantz

career.occupational_title: inneh fma Halmstads Kem Tvätt- & Färgerianst
övering o deläg i Industriens Luftskyddsinstitut
